system.description: When you directly engage a threat with an audience watching, mark a condition to roll + Superior instead of Danger.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: Mark Potential and the GM makes a move.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.ychaHSFqGy2SK7d7]{trade blows} and pick one.
